scripts.start: npm run build && docker compose up --detach
scripts.clean: npm run down && npm run prune
scripts.build: npm run down && docker compose build --parallel
scripts.build:dev: npm run down && docker compose --file docker-compose.dev.yml build --parallel
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && docker compose --file docker-compose.dev.yml up --force-recreate
scripts.prd: npm run build && docker compose up --force-recreate
